textBox.richText: Two joint papers on anti-spoofing have been accepted to ICB 2013: “Complementary Countermeasures for Detecting Scenic Face Spoofing Attacks”, Jukka Komulainen, André Anjos, Abdenour Hadid, Sébastien Marcel and Matti  Pietikainen “Can face anti-spoofing countermeasures work in a real world scenario?”, Tiago De Freitas Pereira, André Anjos, José Mario De Martino, Sébastien Marcel (Oral Presentation) In addition we will be presenting the results of 3 competitions: The 2nd competition on counter measures to 2D facial spoofing attacks: More information at: http://www.tabularasa-euproject.org/evaluations/icb-2013-face-anti-spoofing The 2nd competition on face recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database: More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-face-recognition-mobio The 1st competition on speaker recognition in mobile environment using the MOBIO database More information at: http://www.beat-eu.org/evaluations/icb-2013-speaker-recognition-mobio and the results of the TABULA RASA Spoofing Challenge More information at: http://www.tabularasa-euproject.org/evaluations/tabula-rasa-spoofing-challenge-2013 See you in Spain, Hasta la vista !
